page.title: 08Prestwood - Survey
page.content: We designed a survey of all the children who attend P.M.S. There are 272 boys and girls at P.M.S. and 180 returned the questionaire - a good sample. We asked questions about many things and put this information on our RML 480Z Quest-d file. There are 9 classes of girls and boys of mixed ability from 8 - 12. 3 classes in the 4th. yr. (11-12yrs) and 2 in 1st. 2nd. and 3rd. We have compared some of these facts with information from the 1881 census of this area which we also put onto a Quest file. Maybe it will be even more interesting in 100 or 1000yrs. time. We hope you enjoy reading it wherever or whenever you are. (We allowed for brothers and sisters in school in our statistics by having only the {oldest} child in a family in school fill in a form).
